violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Contact data collected without proper echo confirmation. (1) Customer name 'Родион Геннадьевич' collected at 0:11-0:13, operator repeated name at 0:15 but never asked for confirmation ('Верно?'). (2) Phone number '904.54.33.46.7' at 0:06:21 never echoed back with confirmation. (3) Email 'профанерго...яндекс.ру' at 0:07:23 not echoed with verification.

violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Operator announced 'Минута, пожалуйста' at 7:34 and processed/searched for 60+ seconds until delivering information at 8:35. Search duration: 60.8 seconds exceeds 45-second threshold.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When collecting customer contact information (name, phone, email, address), you must repeat the data back to the customer and ask for explicit confirmation: 'Ваш номер 912-778-1421, верно?' and wait for 'Да' or 'Верно' response. This prevents errors and builds customer confidence in data accuracy.

When system search or order processing exceeds 45 seconds, proactively update the customer every 20-30 seconds ('Я еще проверяю', 'Один момент') and then provide a brief apology/thanks ('Спасибо за ожидание' or 'Приношу извинения за ожидание') when delivering results. Your 60-second wait was felt by the customer.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected. Professional tone maintained throughout call despite customer's lengthy questions.

2.1.evidence: Call completed with proper service delivery. Order successfully placed, no refusal or dropout.

3.1.evidence: Customer request for winter tires (185/65/15 lipuchka) resolved through order placement. Product selected (ICON 185/65/15) and order confirmed.

3.3.evidence: No confidential office numbers, internal codes, or unauthorized personal data disclosed.

3.6.evidence: Operator verified customer information in system before providing details. Responses supported by database lookup references.

4.1.evidence: Customer is talkative and repetitive in questions; operator responds patiently and professionally without showing frustration. Maintains professional tone and helpfulness throughout.
4.1.note: Text-based assessment only; full tone analysis would require audio

5.1.evidence: Order information complete: product type (ICON), size (185/65/15), price (25,400 rubles), delivery address (Serafima Derebina, Ekaterinburg), contact info (phone and email confirmed).

6.1.evidence: Despite 60-second silence during processing, customer did not hang up. Customer acknowledged wait with 'Спасибо' and operator thanked for waiting. No critical hangup occurred.

7.1.evidence: Greeting includes company name ('74 колеса'), operator name ('Евгений'), and offer to help. Closing includes thanks and farewell. Script structure followed.

7.2.evidence: Multiple contact data items collected without echo method: name repeated but no confirmation requested; phone number not echoed; email not verified with customer. See violations_detected for timeline.
7.2.note: Critical protocol violation - repeated in coaching priorities

7.3.evidence: Intro begins at 0:02.472 (within 5s threshold). Disconnect occurs immediately after final speech at 0:09:48.523 (within 5s).

7.4.evidence: No interruptions without apology detected. Operator maintains smooth dialogue flow.

9.1.evidence: Search announced at 7:34.729 ('Минута, пожалуйста'), information delivered at 8:35.565. Total duration 60.8 seconds exceeds 45-second threshold.

9.3.evidence: After long wait/search, operator says 'За ожидание' (thanks for waiting) at 8:35.565 before delivering information.

10.2.evidence: Product information delivered per script: tire specifications, availability status, pricing, and order details clearly communicated. Logical flow maintained.

10.3.evidence: Customer name 'Родион Геннадьевич' used consistently. Operator shows patience with customer's detailed questions. Professional dialogue with proper opening and closing.

10.6.evidence: All required information delivered: product details (ICON 185/65/15), pricing (25,400 RUB), availability (по заказу/by order), delivery location, and contact confirmation.

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company and operator name clearly stated
Proper closing with thanks and farewell
Customer name used consistently throughout conversation (Родион Геннадьевич)
Handled complex product questions patiently and comprehensively
Successfully completed customer request (order placed for tires)
Thanked customer for waiting after search
Confirmed order details including delivery address and contact info

data_quality.confidence_notes: Call duration 588 seconds. Contact data handling clearly visible in transcript. Long silence during processing clearly marked by timestamps. Transcript quality is good with clear speaker attribution.
